name: Master Target Bottle
description:
Master Target Bottle is one of the best free bottle shoot games. Blast the bottles by using the gun. Game
is the free casual game with expert and challenging levels. You are free to shoot anywhere or anyone but the main aim is to shoot bottle.
Features
- Smooth and steady control
- Simple and addictive game play
- Excellent shooting experience
-Best for shooting lovers
-A new way of extreme bottle shooting
